00030 #ifndef _IDXGROUP_H_
00031 #define _IDXGROUP_H_
00032 
00033 #include <cstring>
00034 #include <map>
00035 #include <string>
00036 #include <vector>
00037 //
00038 
00039 class IdxGroup {
00040 
00041   //  typedef unsigned int element_idx;
00042   
00043 public:
00044   
00045   /** 
00046    * @brief Constructor
00047    */
00048   IdxGroup() : m_grouping_count(0) {}
00049   
00050   /**
00051    * @brief Insert group of indexes into grouping of given name
00052    * @param groupname - name/category of grouping
00053    * @param group - integers that belong to a group
00054    */
00055   unsigned int addGroup(std::string grouping_name, std::vector<unsigned int> group);
00056   
00057   /**
00058    * @brief Get count of groups with given grouping name
00059    * @param groupname - name/category of grouping
00060    */
00061   int getGroupCount(std::string grouping_name);
00062   
00063   /**
00064    * @brief Get vector of vectors constituting the groups of indexes for given grouping name
00065    * @param groupname - name/category of grouping
00066    */
00067   std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int> > getGroupingVec(std::string grouping_name);// {return return m_groups[m_grouping_name_to_grouping_idx[grouping_name]];}
00068   
00069   /**
00070    * @brief Get group at given index with given grouping name
00071    * @param groupname - name/category of grouping
00072    * @param group_idx - index of group in grouping vector
00073    */
00074   std::vector<unsigned int> getGroup(std::string grouping_name, unsigned int group_idx);// {return m_groups[m_grouping_name_to_grouping_idx[grouping_name]][group_idx];}
00075   
00076   /**
00077    * @brief Get group containing given index with given grouping name
00078    * @param groupname - name/category of grouping
00079    * @param idx - element inside group of interest
00080    */
00081   std::vector<unsigned int> getGroupContainingIdx(std::string grouping_name, unsigned int idx);  
00082   
00083   /**
00084    * @brief Get other elements of a group containing given index with given grouping name
00085    * @param groupname - name/category of grouping
00086    * @param idx - element inside group of interest
00087    */
00088   std::vector<unsigned int> getOthersGroupContainingIdx(std::string grouping_name, unsigned int idx);
00089   
00090   /**
00091    * @brief Verify that the grouping name exists
00092    */
00093   bool groupingNameExists(std::string grouping_name) {return m_grouping_name_to_grouping_idx.count(grouping_name)!=0;} 
00094   
00095   /**
00096    * @brief Verify that the grouping name exists
00097    * @param groupname - name of grouping
00098    */
00099   bool groupingNameRequire(std::string grouping_name);  
00100   
00101   
00102   /**
00103    * @brief Verify that the given group index is valid for the given grouping name
00104    * @param groupname - name of grouping
00105    * @param group_idx - index of group in grouping vector
00106    */
00107   bool groupIdxRequire(std::string grouping_name, unsigned int group_idx);
00108   
00109   /**
00110    * @brief Verify that the given index element has been entered for the given grouping name
00111    * @param groupname - name of grouping
00112    * @param idx - index that is an element of some group
00113    */
00114   bool elementIdxRequire(std::string grouping_name, unsigned int idx);
00115   
00116 private:
00117   /// map of groupname to group index
00118   std::map<std::string, unsigned int> m_grouping_name_to_grouping_idx;
00119   /// vector of indexes into group
00120   // group_idx = m_element_idx[grouping_idx][element_idx]
00121   std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int> > m_element_idx_to_group_idx;
00122   /// vector of groups
00123   std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int> > > m_groups;
00124   /// grouping count
00125   unsigned int m_grouping_count;
00126 };
